import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}

    software_system = re.findall(r'\b(ASPERA-3 Processing and Archiving Facility (APAF) ground data system)\b', sentence)
    if software_system:
        entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(Mars Express spacecraft)\b', sentence)
    if physical_device:
        entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(Mars)\b', sentence)
    if environment_object:
        entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(database)\b', sentence)
    if external_system:
        entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(send data|receive data)\b', sentence)
    if system_requirements:
        entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(\w+)\b', sentence)
    if shared_phenomena:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Split the sentence into words
    words = sentence.split()

    # Loop through each word
    for i in range(len(words)):
        # Check if the word is a software system
        if words[i].lower() == "system" and words[i+1].lower() == "data":
            entities["Software System"].append(" ".join(words[i:i+2]))
        # Check if the word is a physical device
        elif words[i].lower() == "n" and words[i+1].lower() == "is" and words[i+2].lower() == "a":
            entities["Physical Device"].append(" ".join(words[i:i+3]))
        # Check if the word is an environment object
        elif words[i].lower() == "the" and words[i+1].lower() == "patient":
            entities["Environment Object"].append(" ".join(words[i:i+2]))
        # Check if the word is an external system
        elif words[i].lower() == "a" and words[i+1].lower() == "database":
            entities["External System"].append(" ".join(words[i:i+2]))
        # Check if the word is a system requirement
        elif words[i].lower() == "provides" and words[i+1].lower() == "web-based" and words[i+2].lower() == "displays":
            entities["System Requirements"].append(" ".join(words[i:i+3]))
        # Check if the word is a shared phenomenon
        elif words[i].lower() == "a" and words[i+1].lower() == "set" and words[i+2].lower() == "of":
            entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(" ".join(words[i:i+3]))

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s(system|software|application|program|system)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(physical|hardware|device|component|instrument)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(environment|object|entity|patient|sun|old)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(database|card|tap|hard disk|system)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(aim|purpose|requirement|goal|objective)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(event|state|value|phenomena)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

Extracts entities from a software requirements specification sentence.

* `External System`: A manually designed domain that can store data messages.

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"each of the \w+ components|the \w+ system|the \w+ software"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"\w+ device|the \w+ instrument"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"\w+ patient|the \w+|the \w+ old"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"\w+ database|the \w+ card|the \w+ disk"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"will define and fully describe all of the data products contained within each individual virtual instrument"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"\w+ events|the \w+ states|the \w+ values"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(magnetic stripe card|hard disk|tap|database)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(the patient|the sun|the old)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(magnetic stripe card|hard disk|tap|database)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(read the data|write the data)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = []
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+-based\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+ card\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+ patient\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+ database\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+ protected\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+ goals\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?system"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?device"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?object"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?system"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+have|shall\s+be|shall\s+send|shall\s+receive"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"send|receive|data|information"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The APAF ground data system shall have built-in error handling for better data integrity."))
print(extract_entities("The APAF ground data system shall have built-in error handling for better data integrity and the system shall be able to send data to the external system."))
print(extract_entities("The APAF ground data system shall have built-in error handling for better data integrity and the system shall be able to send data to the external system and the system shall be able to receive data from the physical device."))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = []
    # Software System
    software_system = re.search(r'\bthe system\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if software_system:
        entities.append('Software System')
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.search(r'\bthe printer\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if physical_device:
        entities.append('Physical Device')
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.search(r'\bthe user\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if environment_object:
        entities.append('Environment Object')
    # External System
    external_system = re.search(r'\bthe database\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if external_system:
        entities.append('External System')
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.search(r'\bthe system requirements\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if system_requirements:
        entities.append('System Requirements')
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.search(r'\bthe shared phenomena\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if shared_phenomena:
        entities.append('Shared Phenomena')
    return entities

# Test the function
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'ASPERA-3|MEX OA|ASPERA-3 Co-I|MEX mission goals and objectives', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'ASPERA-3|MEX OA', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'the patient|the sun|the old', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'meeting MEX mission goals and objectives', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'events|states|values', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
```
```python
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+ system)"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([a-z]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"([a-z]+ [a-z]+ to [a-z]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([a-z]+ [a-z]+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\bAPAF\b', sentence)
    if software_system:
        entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\bpatient monitor\b', sentence)
    physical_device += re.findall(r'\bnurse station\b', sentence)
    physical_device += re.findall(r'\bpatient\b', sentence)
    physical_device += re.findall(r'\bdoctor\b', sentence)
    if physical_device:
        entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\bpatient\b', sentence)
    environment_object += re.findall(r'\bdoctor\b', sentence)
    if environment_object:
        entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\bdbase\b', sentence)
    external_system += re.findall(r'\bdatabase\b', sentence)
    if external_system:
        entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bsystem requirements\b', sentence)
    if system_requirements:
        entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\bshared phenomena\b', sentence)
    if shared_phenomena:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities
